rows.label: tev011801_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev011801_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Walter to tell you about himself.

rows.label: tev011801_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev011801_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Walter if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev011801_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Walter about fighting in Skells.

rows.label: tev011801_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Walter about Skell frame levels.

rows.label: tev011801_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Walter what to do when a Skell is destroyed.

rows.label: tev011801_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Walter if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev011801_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Walter about recent developments.

rows.label: tev011801_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hmm? Ah, yes. [ST:playername ], isn't it?
Hah! Don't be surprised. It was quite obvious.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011801_MSG0002
rows.name:
Providing guidance to new BLADEs is one of my duties,
so Elma's report made it straight to my desk.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011801_MSG0003
rows.name:
Might I give you one piece of advice?
Do what you must to survive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011801_MSG0004
rows.name:
Attack your foes from the back or side, but never
head-on. Call it cowardice if you likeâ€”it's still quite
preferable to being dead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011801_MSG0005
rows.name:
I believe the most important asset of a BLADE is the
judgment to calmly assess any situation, no matter how
dire it may appear to be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011801_MSG0006
rows.name:
That said, a girl named Mia who possesses not a
single shred of that judgment has just applied for a
transfer to BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011801_MSG0007
rows.name:
I'm not enthusiastic about her prospects. She has pluck,
true, but pluck without judgment is a recipe for an
early and needless death.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011801_MSG0008
rows.name:
I just saw her out behind Division Drive. She seemed
to be thinking quite deeply about something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011801_MSG0009
rows.name:
Whatever she's plotting, I'm sure it's nothing good.
I hope I can convince her to quit soon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011801_MSG0010
rows.name:
Are you asking if piloting a Skell makes one invincible?
Not quite. But if you intend to battle foes that are much
larger than yourself, a Skell is usually the right choice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011801_MSG0011
rows.name:
However, some technicians claim that you are better off
if you choose the right ground gear and affix the right
weapon augments for any specific battle situation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011801_MSG0012
rows.name:
They go so far as to say that, with the right ground
gear, you can even slay some tyrants that would be
difficult to defeat with a Skell, while you are on foot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011801_MSG0013
rows.name:
That is an untested theory at the moment.
But I do hope that you will always strive to achieve
your utmost potential in ground combat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011801_MSG0025
rows.name:
Just having a Skell license doesn't mean that you're
capable of piloting any type of Skell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011801_MSG0027
rows.name:
You'll need a correspondingly high level of your own
before you can pilot the more powerful models.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011801_MSG0028
rows.name:
Acquiring a Skell license is merely the first step in a
Skell pilot's advancement.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011801_MSG0029
rows.name:
You must continue to work hard if you hope to become
a pilot worthy of a first-rate Skell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011801_MSG0026
rows.name:
When you purchase a Skell, an insurance policy of
some sort will be included.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011801_MSG0030
rows.name:
As long as your policy is active, your Skell will be
repaired at no charge, even if it's completely destroyed.
But, it may cause you to use up your insurance policy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011801_MSG0031
rows.name:
If you trash a Skell once the policy has expired, and
without having purchased additional salvage tickets,
you'll have to salvage it at your own expense.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011801_MSG0032
rows.name:
If money is tight, make sure to review your insurance
policies and number of salvage tickets you hold when
selecting which Skell to use on a mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011801_MSG0014
rows.name:
I haven't seen Mia around lately. She's that mechanic
who asked for a transfer to BLADE, but... Wait, what?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011801_MSG0015
rows.name: You say you helped her with her wish to join BLADE?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011801_MSG0016
rows.name:
You gave her gear and weaponry and set her
off on a journey? You fool! How could you?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011801_MSG0017
rows.name:
...I'm sorry. I'm sure It wasn't your fault.
I know Mia can be quite convincing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011801_MSG0018
rows.name:
If you happen across her on one of your missions,
might you give her a message for me?
Just tell her not to die, if you would.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011801_MSG0020
rows.name: Mia passed the BLADE exam on her first try.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011801_MSG0021
rows.name:
But I've heard that the cost of the Skell she stole and
destroyed will be garnished from her reward money.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011801_MSG0022
rows.name:
Nevertheless, it pleases me to see a new student grow
and exceed my expectations like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011801_MSG0023
rows.name:
As for you, please continue to assess your situation
and act prudently.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011801_MSG0024
rows.name: Oh, and don't die.[ST:wait ]
